results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Oxidative Stress, NF-kappaB Activation, and Artery Calcification in LDLR-/- Mice Fed with High Fat Diet via Down-regulation of Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha and TNF Receptor 1
